dct_title_s: Paskaerte van NOVA GRANADA, en t'Eylandt CALIFORNIA
dct_description_sm: California as an island on second Sanson model. Nearly identical with Van Loon's map of same title but location of some place names differ. P. de Monte Rey is north of P.S. Francisco Draco, and Canal de S. BarLandt, Straet Anian, and Agubela de Cato to north.bara is north of P. de la Conversion. Terra Incognita (or) Onbekent Landt, Straet Anian, and Agubela de Cato to north.
LC 473, 474, & 3435; Wagner 394; Tooley 22 (Plate 37); Leighly 47 (Plate X); Koeman,IV,Goos1B(40); UCB; Goss (Plate 37); Nordenskiöld 1,80(39); Burden 391 (Plate 391).
Multiple scales given within cartouche flanked by 2 cherubs holding instruments (bottom left).

Issued in his: De Zee-Atlas, ofte water-weereld, Amsterdam, 1666. Reissued 1668, 1669, 1670, 1672, 1675, 1676. Issued in his: L’Atlas de la mer, ou monde aquaticque, representant toutes les costes maritimes de l’Univers descouvertes & cogneues ... -- A Amsterdam : Chez Pieter Goos, au miroir de la Mer, 1670, 1673, 1679 and 1697. Issued in English edition 1668, and Spanish edition 1669.
